Name: Gunung Mulu National Park
Description: Gunung Mulu National Park - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Spectacular karst landscape with extensive cave systems and biodiversity.

Name: Kinabalu Park
Description: Kinabalu Park - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Home to Mount Kinabalu, Southeast Asia's highest peak, with diverse flora and fauna.

Name: Melaka and George Town
Designation: Historic Cities of the Straits of Malacca
URL: Melaka and George Town - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic trading cities with multicultural heritage and colonial architecture.

Name: Archaeological Heritage of the Lenggong Valley
Description: Archaeological Heritage of the Lenggong Valley - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Prehistoric archaeological sites with evidence of early human habitation.
